#Objects
A point
B point
C point
D point
E point
F point
G point

LAB line
LCD line
LCE line
LDE line

LAG line
LFA line
LFG line

CC circle
CA circle


#Relations
centre(C,CC)
coincident(D,CC)
coincident(E,CC)
not_coincident(D,E)

end_points(A,B,LAB)
end_points(C,D,LCD)
end_points(C,E,LCE)
end_points(D,E,LDE)

coincident(G,LAB)

centre(A,CA)
coincident(F,CA)
coincident(G,CA)

end_points(A,G,LAG)
end_points(F,A,LFA)
end_points(F,G,LFG)

length_equal(LCD,LFA)
length_equal(LCE,LAG)
length_equal(LDE,LFG)
